Package render

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • render.Camera
  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    The Camera is the view point of the user in the scene
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Camera()
      Creates a Camera with location (0, 0, 0) facing along the z axis
      Camera​(Point location)
      Creates a Camera with a specific location facing along the z axis
      Camera​(Point location, double pitch, double yaw)
      Creates a Camera with a specific location facing a specific direction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changeAngleRelative​(double x, double y)
      Changes the direction that the camera is facing by specific angles.
      Point getLocation()
      Gets the Camera Location.
      double getPitch()
      Gets the Camera pitch (angle up from xz plane).
      double getYaw()
      Gets the Camera yaw (angle right from yz plane).
      void moveFawardByDisplacment​(double x)
      Moves the Camera by a distance in the direction the camera is facing.
      void moveRelative​(double x, double y, double z)
      Moves the camera by an offset from the current location.
      void moveRightByDisplacment​(double x)
      Moves the Camera by a distance in the direction perpendicular to both direction the camera is facing and the y axis.
      void setLocation​(double x, double y, double z)
      Moves the Camera to a specific location.
      void setLocation​(Point location)
      Sets the Camera location.
      void setPitch​(double x)
      Sets the pitch (angle up from xz plane) angle.
      void setYaw​(double x)
      Sets the yaw (angle right from yz plane) angle.

        location - The location for the Camera to be initialsed at.

      • Camera

        public Camera​(Point location,
              double pitch,
              double yaw)
        Creates a Camera with a specific location facing a specific direction.
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the Camera to be initialsed at.
        pitch - The angle the Camera is facing up from the xz plane.
        yaw - The angle the Camera is facing right from the yz plane.
        Since:
        1.0

      • moveRelative

        public void moveRelative​(double x,
                         double y,
                         double z)
        Moves the camera by an offset from the current location.
        Parameters:
        x - The size of the offset in the x direction.
        y - The size of the offset in the y direction.
        z - The size of the offset in the z direction.
        Since:
        1.0

        Parameters:

        y - The y position to move the Camera to.
        z - The z position to move the Camera to.

        1.0
